row.process:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = &ANALYTICS_PG_PASSWORD# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!--------------------------------------------------------------- ! Execute ANALYZE on ah_cleaned table !--------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Execute ANALYZE on ah_cleaned table now." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO $env:PGPASSWORD=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD &ANALYTICS_PSQL_PATH#\psql -t -A -h &ANALYTICS_PG_HOST# -p &ANALYTICS_PG_PORT# -U &ANALYTICS_PG_USERNAME# -d &ANALYTICS_PG_DATABASE# -c 'ANALYZE VERBOSE ah_cleaned;' :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
!--------------------------------------------------------------- ! Execute ANALYZE on ara_execution_cleaned table !--------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Execute ANALYZE on ara_execution_cleaned table now." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO &ANALYTICS_PSQL_PATH#\psql -t -A -h &ANALYTICS_PG_HOST# -p &ANALYTICS_PG_PORT# -U &ANALYTICS_PG_USERNAME# -d &ANALYTICS_PG_DATABASE# -c 'ANALYZE VERBOSE ara_execution_cleaned;' :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
!--------------------------------------------------------------- ! Execute ANALYZE on laslm_cleaned table !--------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Execute ANALYZE on laslm_cleaned table now." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO &ANALYTICS_PSQL_PATH#\psql -t -A -h &ANALYTICS_PG_HOST# -p &ANALYTICS_PG_PORT# -U &ANALYTICS_PG_USERNAME# -d &ANALYTICS_PG_DATABASE# -c 'ANALYZE VERBOSE laslm_cleaned;' :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Successfully terminated job: PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.JOB.DATASTORE_OPTIMIZE@WINDOWS." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
